block.p: LEAD: Mr. and Mrs. Monte Fishman of Bronxville, N.Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter Carrie G. Fishman to Daniel S. Polsky, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Louis Polsky of Floral Park, Queens. Miss Fishman is an associate at the New York law firm of Otterbourg, Steindler, Houston & Rosen. Her fiance is a senior consultant in the national reorganization and bankruptcy group at Price Waterhouse in New York.

LEAD: Mr. and Mrs. Monte Fishman of Bronxville, N.Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter Carrie G. Fishman to Daniel S. Polsky, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Louis Polsky of Floral Park, Queens. Miss Fishman is an associate at the New York law firm of Otterbourg, Steindler, Houston & Rosen. Her fiance is a senior consultant in the national reorganization and bankruptcy group at Price Waterhouse in New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Monte Fishman of Bronxville, N.Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter Carrie G. Fishman to Daniel S. Polsky, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Louis Polsky of Floral Park, Queens. Miss Fishman is an associate at the New York law firm of Otterbourg, Steindler, Houston & Rosen. Her fiance is a senior consultant in the national reorganization and bankruptcy group at Price Waterhouse in New York. The wedding is planned for Oct. 8.
